para: This filter is used to "fix" unreliable GPS data by discarding points with HDOP and/or VDOP above a specified limit. HDOP and VDOP are measures of the best possible horizontal or vertical precision for a given configuration of GPS satellites.

para.userinput: gpsbabel -i gpx -f in.gpx -x discard,hdop=10,vdop=20,hdopandvdop -o gpx -F out.gpx
